page.title: 15Recreation in West Enfield
page.content: In Western Enfield there are day and evening classes to teach you about many subjects including classes in preperation for A and O level examinations. Adults can take evening classes at Southgate Lower School in these subjects:Spanish,Italian,History, Music,Parachuting,Photography,Radio, Wood-Carving,Wood-Work,Hair and Beauty Grooming and Violin Making. At Southgate Upper School a big proportion of the classes are sporting activities like volley ball,net ball,hocky and yoga. Also there are Keepfit,Yoga and Art classes at Grange Park and Eversley Junior Schools. Adults can also go to church halls in our area for evening classes in these subjects:Yoga,Art,First Aid,Floral Art,French,Dance and Dress Making.
